title: The Schools - as they appear to people who teach in them
brief_description: The education system of England and Wales. Teachers from all types of state and private schools talk as individuals about their work - its shortcomings, its frustration, it opportunities, it creative excitement, and its future. How education works in England and Wales is explained and a wide divergence of opinions is revealed as the what, in the end, is the best system, to meet today’s needs.
